Articles.Content:
I would love to have a mod that included pulsjets and maybe a ramjet or other different engiens...

The pulsjet would be like an air breathing booster and should maybe be like the v1 bombs engien.

i have looked around if i could find a mod like this but i havn't, and i would realy like to have a mod that ads this. 

Hope any good modder sees this so it can be added.

I'm not sure there is a mod for that, though some other suggestions were made when you [last posted this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114033-Pulsjet-mod). Locking this as a duplicate.
